readable.title: 241346146_f27759296d
readable.content: A football player from the Sooners is about to be taken down by the opposing team in a game . A football player tries tackling another player who has the ball . An Sooners football player eluding the tackle of two Huskies defenders . The football player is running with the ball as a player of the opposing team grabs his leg The Sooner football player carrying the ball is trying to avoid being tackled .
